DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study measure lipid deposit commercially market contact lenses worn extend wear ( overnight ) basis 7 day .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Deposits Contact Lenses Worn Extended Wear
DOC.criteria: Age 18 older . Visual acuity correctable 20/30 ( Snellen ) good eye distance contact lenses . Successfully wear hydrogel silicone hydrogel contact lens . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Evidence history ocular condition prescribe protocol . One functional eye monofit lens . Any slitlamp finding score ( 1 ) Screening Visit define protocol . Use concomitant topical ocular prescription overthecounter ocular medication . History seasonal allergy significant ocular side effect . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
